<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.PlannedMaintenanceConstants</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>This class maintains the constants related to PM.</description>
        <name>PlannedMaintenanceConstants</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var PlannedMaintenanceConstants = Class.create();
PlannedMaintenanceConstants.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },

    type: 'PlannedMaintenanceConstants'
};
PlannedMaintenanceConstants.PMEXTPOINT = "PlannedMaintenanceExtensionPoint";
PlannedMaintenanceConstants.EMPTY_STRING = "";
PlannedMaintenanceConstants.PLAN_RECORD_BATCH_FOR_DELETE = 120;
PlannedMaintenanceConstants.STRING_SEPARATOR_DOLLAR = "$";
PlannedMaintenanceConstants.STRING_SEPARATOR_COMMA = ",";
PlannedMaintenanceConstants.BOOLEAN_TRUE = "true";
PlannedMaintenanceConstants.BOOLEAN_FALSE = "false";
// BRs
PlannedMaintenanceConstants.AUTO_MAINTENANCE_RULE = "Auto maintenance plan business rule";
PlannedMaintenanceConstants.AUTO_MAINTENANCE_RULE_METHOD = "associateSourceToMatchingGeneralPlanRecords";
// Plan types
PlannedMaintenanceConstants.PLAN_TYPE_MODEL_BASED = "model_based";
PlannedMaintenanceConstants.PLAN_TYPE_GENERAL = "general";
// Tables
PlannedMaintenanceConstants.SM_SCHEDULE = "sm_schedule";
PlannedMaintenanceConstants.SM_MAINT_PLAN = "sm_maint_plan";
PlannedMaintenanceConstants.SM_M2M_PLAN_RECORD = "sm_m2m_maint_plan_to_record";
PlannedMaintenanceConstants.WM_MAINT_PLAN = "wm_planned_work_plan";
PlannedMaintenanceConstants.WM_SCHEDULE = "wm_planned_work_schedule";
PlannedMaintenanceConstants.WM_M2M_PLAN_RECORD = "wm_m2m_work_plan_to_record";

// Events
PlannedMaintenanceConstants.BATCH_CLEANUP_PLANRECORDS_EVENT = "batch.cleanup.planrecords";
PlannedMaintenanceConstants.CLEANUP_PLANRECORDS_EVENT = "cleanup.planrecords";
PlannedMaintenanceConstants.PLAN_RECORD_BATCH_LIMIT_PROPERTY = "planned_maintenance.order.creation.batch.limit";
PlannedMaintenanceConstants.BATCH_GENERATE_ORDER_EVENT = 'batch_generate_order';
PlannedMaintenanceConstants.BATCH_GENERATE_ORDER_PLAN_EVENT = 'batch_generate_order_at_plan';
PlannedMaintenanceConstants.BATCH_GENERATE_ORDER_SCHEDULE_EVENT = 'batch_generate_order_at_schedule';
PlannedMaintenanceConstants.BATCH_GENERATE_ORDER_QUEUE = "generate_order_queue";
//trigger
PlannedMaintenanceConstants.DURATION_TRIGGER = "10";
PlannedMaintenanceConstants.METER_TRIGGER = "meter";
PlannedMaintenanceConstants.DURATIONORMETER_TRIGGER = "durationormeter";
PlannedMaintenanceConstants.CONDITION_TRIGGER = "condition";
PlannedMaintenanceConstants.SCRIPT_TRIGGER = "script";
]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>

</record_update>
